name: First National Bank of Lamoille Valley
description: First National Bank of Lamoille Valley (FNLC) is a community bank dedicated to providing exceptional banking services to individuals and businesses in the Lamoille Valley region of Vermont. Founded in 1851, FNLC has a rich history of serving its community with integrity and commitment. The bank offers a wide range of financial products, including personal and business checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services. FNLC prides itself on its personalized customer service, understanding the unique needs of its clients and tailoring solutions accordingly. With a focus on community involvement, the bank actively participates in local events and supports various charitable initiatives, reinforcing its commitment to the well-being of the communities it serves. First National Bank of Lamoille Valley is also dedicated to leveraging technology to enhance the banking experience, providing online banking and mobile app services that allow customers to manage their finances conveniently and securely. The bank's mission is to empower its customers to achieve their financial goals through sound advice and innovative banking solutions, all while maintaining a strong local presence. FNLC is committed to maintaining a safe and sound banking environment, ensuring the trust and security of its customers' assets.

seo.meta_title: First National Bank of Lamoille Valley | Community Banking in Vermont
seo.meta_description: Discover First National Bank of Lamoille Valley, a community bank providing personalized banking services and financial solutions to the Lamoille Valley region. Learn more about our products and commitment to the community.
keywords: First National Bank of Lamoille Valley

faq.question: What services does FNLC offer?
faq.answer: FNLC offers a variety of services including personal and business banking, loans, mortgages, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is FNLC headquartered?
faq.answer: FNLC is headquartered in Saintowe, Vermont, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of FNLC?
faq.answer: Shawn D. O'Mara is the CEO of First National Bank of Lamoille Valley.

faq.question: How can I access FNLC's banking services?
faq.answer: You can access FNLC's banking services through their website, online banking, or by visiting one of their local branches.
